parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row in which the cell resides

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column in which the cell resides

title: ITableAnnotation.GetCellUseDocTextFormat
description: Gets whether this cell uses the document setting for its text format.
signature:
System.Boolean GetCellUseDocTextFormat( 
   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
)

parameters.name: Row
parameters.description: Index of the row in which the cell resides

parameters.name: Column
parameters.description: Index of the column in which the cell resides

returns: True to use the document setting for its text format, false to not
remarks: The index for both the rows and columns in this table are 0-based.
